title: K – Return of Kings: Prelude - Novel Updates
author: Gora   Miyazawa Tatsuki   Raikaku Rei   Suzuki Suzu   Takahashi Yashichirou
description:
A collection of 4 chapters set before the K - Return of Kings anime.

– Blue chapter 「眼鏡屋別サイド」 (Optician’s, Another Side) by Miyazawa Tatsuki

– Silver chapter 「お風呂ネコトラブル」 (Neko Bathtime Trouble) by Raikaku Rei

– Green chapter 「”JUNGLE”」 (“Jungle”) by Takahashi Yashichirou

– Red chapter 「呼び名のその後」 (Aftermath of the Nickname) by Suzuki Suzu>
